module.name: ap243_boundary_representation_for_iso_14306_open_jt
module.name.french: Representation géométrique par surfaces délimitées de l'AP 243 pour l'ISO 14306 Open JT

abstract.p:
This application protocol provides STEP B-Rep data model segment to ISO 14306 JT file format.
STEP B-Rep data model defines the precise solid geometric boundary representation data for a particular 3D part.

The JT format described in ISO 14306 Standard is used primarily in industrial use cases as the means for capturing and repurposing lightweight 3D product definition data.
ISO 14306 provides the description of the structure and content for a binary file consisting of several segments of data, one of them being STEP B-Rep segment.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the precise solid geometric boundary representation of 3D product definition data for ISO 14306 open JT as STEP B-Rep data segment. (@@@@ TO VALIDATE @@@@)

inscope.li:
Properties
assignment of a property to product data.

outscope.li: bounded curves other than polylines and B-spline curves;
bounded surfaces other than B-spline surfaces;
definition of views on which shape models, geometric elements or annotation are presented;
